string.text: %c[default]Item Bonus:\n%c[255,238,153,26]• %c[default]Increase bullet resistance %c[255,238,15,26](%c[255,1,128,54]when installed by a mechanic%c[255,238,15,26])\n%c[default]Specialized protective element, with which you can increase protection against bullet wounds.

%c[default]Item Bonus:\n%c[255,238,153,26]• %c[default]Increase bullet resistance %c[255,238,15,26](%c[255,1,128,54]when installed by a mechanic%c[255,238,15,26])\n%c[default]Specialized protective element, with which you can increase protection against bullet wounds.
Replacing the metal with carbon fiber reinforced plastic reduces the weight of the binoculars without losing functionality.

Modification Attiki, which is to increase the contrast. Helps to monitor when there is insufficient lighting.\n----------------------------------------\n%c[255,238,153,26]Enable/disable highlighting of binoculars, you can press "$$ACTION_NIGHT_VISION$$".%c[default]
Installation of more powerful lenses to monitor for a few long distances.
